content: प्रदोष {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Bad, corrupt. --षः {@--1@} ({%a%}) A fault, defect, sin, offence. ({%b%}) Transgression, violation. {@--2@} Disordered condition, such as mutiny, rebellion. {@--3@} Evening, nightfall, the first part of the night; तमःस्वभावास्तेऽप्यन्ये प्रदोषमनुयायिनः <ls>Śi. 2. 98</ls> (where प्रदोष primarily means ‘corrupt’ or ‘bad’); व्रजसुंदरीजनमनस्तोषप्रदोषः <ls>Gīt. 5</ls>; <ls>Ku. 5. 44</ls>; <ls>R. 1. 93</ls>; <ls>Rs. 1. 12.</ls>
